mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM user_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} AND p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT p.id FROM user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = - 1 AND pr.user_id = #{userId} ) UNION SELECT p.* FROM user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = 1 AND pr.user_id = #{userId}
